statements: DELETE FROM survey_responses WHERE respondent_id = 100 AND survey_id = 2;
DELETE FROM survey_responses WHERE respondent_id = 123 AND answer_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM survey_responses WHERE question_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND survey_id = 456;
DELETE FROM survey_responses WHERE id = 1 AND user_id = 101;
DELETE FROM survey_summary WHERE total_responses > 100 AND max_response_length < 50;
DELETE FROM SurveyAnalytics WHERE survey_id = '876e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND question_id = 1;
DELETE FROM SurveyAnalytics WHERE survey_id = '11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111' AND trend_type = 'positive';
DELETE FROM survey_results WHERE score < 50 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
